Sentencas: The main purpose of this study was to create crack-free thin film electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells at low cost.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition (EPD) technique was employed to prepare dense yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thin films on stainless steel and porous strontium-doped lanthanum.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells
Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSM substrates were produced by slurry casting and subsequent sintering.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The suspensions of YSZ were prepared in pure acetylacetone, ethanol, and in mixtures of the two.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The deposition experiments were performed with the YSZ suspensions in different solvents to examine the effects of the solvent on the EPD behavior.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of current density and powder concentration on the EPD rate were also studied.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The deposited films were dried at room temperature and then sintered at high temperatures.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructures of the sintered coatings were observed with scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By using a partially sintered LSM substrate and an optimized set of deposition conditions, dense and continuous YSZ thin film coatings with thicknesses less than 10 gm were achieved.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coatings for solid oxide fuel cells
